attributes.action: We, the People, demand the immediate cessation of all parliamentary activity.
attributes.background: We, the People, no longer trust the two party political system or politicians of the government and parliament to act on our behalf and request an immediate cessation of all parliamentary activity so that we, the People, can decide the structure of a future diplomatic process to fairly represent us.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
